      • newGame

        protected abstract void newGame(Game game)
        Launch the new game. This method set up the MVC architectural pattern and the Observer behavioral pattern used during the game.
        Parameters:
        game - The launched game.

      • newMenu

        protected void newMenu()
        Create a new menu and collect information for the future game. This method set up the MVC architectural pattern and the Observer behavioral pattern used for the menu.

      • newGame

        protected void newGame(Menu menu)
        Create a new game and launch it using the previously collected information from the menu. This method set up the MVC architectural pattern and the Observer behavioral pattern used during the game. Launch either online server, online client or offline mode depending on menu choices.
        Parameters:
        menu - The menu containing the necessary information to launch the game.

      • stopGameServer

        protected void stopGameServer()
        Stop game server.

      • launchGameNetwork

        protected void launchGameNetwork()
        Launch game network.
